summary: Provides a high‑level processor that consumes raw inertial measurement unit (IMU) packets and continuously derives flight‑relevant metrics such as filtered acceleration, altitude, vertical speed and timestamps, while handling dead‑band filtering and gravity compensation.
business_intent: Enable the airbrake system to monitor aircraft state in real time, supporting safety decisions, performance analysis, and control logic by translating low‑level sensor data into actionable flight parameters.
